content: these flower mittens are made with worsted weight yarn perfect for deep cold to make smaller child sized mittens try working them in a dk weight i posted a new version of this pattern on 3/31/22 changes include 1 slightly different stitch counts 2 separate palm pattern 3 improved thumb pattern and instructions here is a great video for picking up stitches in a mitten thumb that doesn t leave a gap that needs to be sewn in later wonderful https //www youtube com/watch v=wsxugbgpn3a
